name: Planetary Jumper: Jump on the planets
name_original: Planetary Jumper: Jump on the planets
description:
Planetary Jumper is a fun and enjoyable endless runner with pleasant controls, the ability to buy outfits from the skin store and other features. This game is a great way to kill some time. Simple but addictive gameplay will not let you get bored wherever you are.

You control a cute creature, on the way of which there are many different planets, on which you will jump. Try to go as far as possible by jumping and dodging obstacles.

You will also collect coins that can be spent in the skin store!
The skin shop contains various unique skins for the main character. You can transform the appearance of your character however you want.

Planetary Jumper Features:
- Works offline;
- Nice and addictive gameplay;
- Lots of random obstacles that become more difficult over time;
- Smooth and comfortable control;
- Unique beautiful outfits in the skin store;

Jump further and further, exploring new planets and dodging asteroids!
